title: Muc-Off Ludicrous AF is Fast AF, claims to be World’s Fastest Race Lube
content:
A ludicrous claim, perhaps. How can Muc-Off possibly know that Ludicrous AF is the World’s Fastest Race Lube? After all, there must be more drivetrain lubricants out there than there are stars in the sky. OK, maybe not that many, but you get the point. The answer is that, after investing a 7 figure sum
